body_content.explanation: abbreviation for Card Verification Code: a number on a credit card or debit card (= a card used for payment), usually three digits (= individual numbers) on the back of the card, that is used to prove that the person making the payment has the card in their possession:
examples: The full credit card number is reprinted in the signature box and at the end of the number is the CVC.
Can I have the CVC number from the back of your card, please?
